headline: Target Expands Beauty Offering As Investors Weigh Mixed Share Performance
summary: Target launched its largest ever Spring beauty assortment, refreshed in store beauty sections, and rolled out the inclusive haircare brand "being" nationwide. The retailer is positioning its expanded beauty and haircare lineup as inclusive and affordable, with an updated shopping experience for customers across the US. These moves are intended to strengthen Target's presence in beauty and haircare, potentially influencing customer traffic and future sales trends. For investors watching...
